skilllist.skilldesc:
Xavier enhances his subsequent skills each time his skill hits an enemy hero. <font color="a6aafb">Stage I:</font> Increases Movement Speed by 50% when subsequent skills hit, decaying over 1.2s. <font color="a6aafb">Stage II:</font> Width of subsequent skills will be greatly increased. <font color="a6aafb">Stage III:</font> Skill Cooldown reduced by 4s (36s for the Ultimate). At <font color="a6aafb">Stage III</font>, Xavier enters the <font color="a6aafb">Transcendence</font> state.

<font color="a6aafb">Transcendence:</font> All of Xavier's skills are enhanced to <font color="a6aafb">Stage III</font> state for 5s (this duration is extended by 1s each time Xavier's skill hits an enemy).

Xavier fires a Mystic Bullet that deals 480<font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies it passes through.

The Bullet's flying distance increases each time it hits an enemy or the <font color="a6aafb">Mystic Barrier</font> (up to 5 times).

Xavier conjures a <font color="a6aafb">Mystic Barrier</font> that lasts 5s. Enemies that come into contact with the Barrier will take 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and be slowed by 50%, while allies will gain 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s.
When hit by Xavier's other skills, the Barrier expands into a <font color="a6aafb">Mystic Field</font> for 3s, dealing 220<font color="62f8fe"> (+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

Xavier unleashes a beam of Mystic magic in the target direction, dealing 600<font color="62f8fe"> (+180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to all enemies along its path.

Once cast, he also directly enters the <font color="a6aafb">Transcendence</font> state and resets the state's duration.

data.name: Xavier

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by 1.5 times within 4s.

<font color="8098ab">This only applies to the hero themselves</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 20s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by <Num2> times within <Num1>s.########[8098ab]This only applies to the hero themselves[-].####[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
The next Ultimate cast decreases other active skills' remaining cooldowns by 1.5 times within 4s.

<font color="8098ab">This only applies to the hero themselves</font>.
<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 20s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: BF - Kodjikk
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Former member of the Knights of Light who's determined to forge a path of his own.

assist.desc: He works well alongside heroes that can buff or provide CC to give him more opportunities to deal damage, such as Carmilla and Atlas.

strong.desc: Xavier possesses short cooldowns, a soft CC, good sustainability and performs well against heroes without Blink or burst damage, such as Hanabi and Faramis.

weak.desc: Xavier is countered by heroes with high mobility that can quickly close a gap such as Benedetta, Hayabusa, and Natalia.
